trans-unit.source: Provides a strongly typed collection for <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> objects and implements the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> interface to support navigating through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Specifica una raccolta fortemente tipizzata per oggetti <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> e implementa l'interfaccia <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable" /> per supportare lo spostamento nella raccolta.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> class provides a strongly typed collection for <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> classe fornisce una raccolta fortemente tipizzata per <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: It stores <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects internally in a zero-based array.
trans-unit.target: Archivia <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti internamente in una matrice in base zero.

trans-unit.source: You can modify a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection when it is first created, and then use the following methods to add, copy, and remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects:
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> raccolta quando si è creato e quindi utilizzare i metodi seguenti per aggiungere, copiare e rimuovere <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti:

trans-unit.source: To add <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Per aggiungere <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> metodi.

trans-unit.source: To copy <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per copiare <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To remove <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per rimuovere <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti, utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: You can create a read-only <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which does not permit adding, copying, nor removing <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects, by using the static <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare una proprietà di sola lettura <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, che non consente l'aggiunta, la copia o la rimozione <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti, tramite il metodo statico <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.ReadOnly%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collections that are returned by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> methods are read-only, as is the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> that is returned when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> property is accessed on a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object that is returned from a provider.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> raccolte restituite dal <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchyData.GetChildren%2A> metodi sono di sola lettura, come avviene la <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> che viene restituito quando il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.ChildNodes%2A> in cui si accede alla proprietà un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetto restituito da un provider.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is thrown, if you attempt to modify a read-only <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> by setting the default indexer property or by using any of the following methods:
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.NotSupportedException> viene generata l'eccezione, se si tenta di modificare una proprietà di sola lettura <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> impostando la proprietà dell'indicizzatore predefinita oppure utilizzando uno dei metodi seguenti:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to check the collection before calling any of the methods in the preceding list.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> proprietà per controllare la raccolta prima di chiamare uno dei metodi nell'elenco precedente.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection, and then add <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects to it using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice riportato di seguito viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> raccolta, quindi aggiungere <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetti tramite il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is a subset of the current site map, showing only the first two hierarchical levels.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> è un subset della mappa del sito corrente, che mostra solo i primi due livelli della gerarchia.

trans-unit.target: È possibile aggiungere elementi per il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A>, o <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection with a single initial <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object, and then add a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> of <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects to it using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor and adding elements to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> che contiene l'elemento <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> da aggiungere all'elemento <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> corrente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> class and adds all the list items of the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> collection to the <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList" /> property for the collection.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor is equivalent to calling the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor and adding elements to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> equivale alla chiamata al costruttore il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore e l'aggiunta di elementi per il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> insieme con il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange%2A> (metodo).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection using another <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> of <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> objects as a base.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode.GetAllNodes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a read-only <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which is detected when the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property returns `true`.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is created using the read-only <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> and the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> and <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> methods can be called successfully.
trans-unit.target: Un nuovo <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> viene creato utilizzando la proprietà di sola lettura <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> e <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> metodi possono essere chiamati correttamente.

trans-unit.target: Indice dell'elemento <see cref="P:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList" /> in cui è stato inserito l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" />.

trans-unit.source: You cannot add a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object to a read-only or fixed-size <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection.

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: In questa sezione contiene due esempi di codice.

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection and add elements to it.
trans-unit.target: Nel primo esempio viene illustrato come creare un nuovo <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> insieme e aggiungervi elementi.

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to add elements to a custom site map provider.
trans-unit.target: Nel secondo esempio di codice viene illustrato come aggiungere elementi a un provider di mappe personalizzate del sito.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, and then add elements to it with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> costruttore per creare un nuovo <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>e quindi aggiungere elementi a esso con il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates a custom site map provider implementation and shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a new <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> and add elements to the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object from the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Item%2A> indicizzatore per recuperare un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> dall'oggetto di <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> insieme.

trans-unit.source: In this example, a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object is removed from its position at the second element of the internal array using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method and is appended to the array with the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In questo esempio, un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetto viene rimosso dalla propria posizione in corrispondenza del secondo elemento della matrice interna utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> metodo e viene aggiunto alla matrice con il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To insert a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object at a specific index, instead of appending it to the end of the array, use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per inserire un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetto in un indice specifico, invece di aggiungerlo alla fine della matrice, usare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed when executing the standard behavior of the underlying <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> metodo consente agli implementatori di definire i processi che devono essere eseguiti durante l'esecuzione del comportamento standard della sottostante <see cref="T:System.Collections.ArrayList" /> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: By defining the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.
trans-unit.target: Definendo il <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> (metodo), i responsabili dell'implementazione può aggiungere funzionalità ai metodi ereditati senza dover eseguire l'override di tutti gli altri metodi.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method is called anytime the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> collection is used via a reference to an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: In particolare, il <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> metodo viene chiamato in qualsiasi momento il <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> insieme viene utilizzato tramite un riferimento a un <see cref="T:System.Collections.IList" /> interfaccia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> objects to add to the read-only <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a read-only collection that contains the nodes in the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una raccolta di sola lettura che contiene i nodi nella raccolta <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> specificata.

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> with the same <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> elements and structure as the original <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Elemento <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> di sola lettura con gli stessi elementi <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNode" /> e la stessa struttura dell'elemento <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> originale.

trans-unit.source: You can test whether a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is read-only by checking the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: È possibile verificare se un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> raccolta è di sola lettura controllando il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsFixedSize%2A> property also returns `true` when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsFixedSize%2A> proprietà restituisce inoltre `true` quando un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> è di sola lettura.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> property to test whether a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is read-only or modifiable.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.IsReadOnly%2A> proprietà per verificare se un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> raccolta è di sola lettura o modificabili.

trans-unit.source: If `siteNodes` is modifiable, `MoveNode` is called on it; otherwise, a clone <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is created, using `siteNodes` as a base.
trans-unit.target: Se `siteNodes` è modificabile, `MoveNode` viene chiamato su di esso; in caso contrario, un clone <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> viene creato utilizzando `siteNodes` come base.

trans-unit.source: A read-only <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> collection supports read and search operations, but does not support the <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, <see cref="Overload:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" /> methods, nor the setter on the default indexer property, <see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: Sola lettura <see cref="T:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection" /> raccolta supporta le operazioni di lettura e di ricerca, ma non supporta il <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, <see cref="Overload:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.AddRange" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Clear" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Insert(System.Int32,System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove(System.Web.SiteMapNode)" />, e <see cref="M:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.RemoveAt(System.Int32)" /> metodi, né il metodo di impostazione sull'indicizzatore predefinito proprietà <see cref="P:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Item(System.Int32)" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method to remove a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object from a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection, and then append the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> using the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Remove%2A> metodo per rimuovere un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> dell'oggetto da un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> insieme e quindi aggiungere il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> oggetto alla fine del <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> utilizzando il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection.Add%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is read-only, a <xref:System.NotSupportedException> exception is caught.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> è di sola lettura, un <xref:System.NotSupportedException> eccezione viene intercettata.

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: L'enumerazione di una <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> raccolta non è quindi una procedura thread-safe.

trans-unit.source: Even when a <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> is synchronized, other threads can still modify the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Anche quando un <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> è sincronizzata, altri thread può modificare il <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection>, che comporta l'enumeratore generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes that are made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Per garantire la protezione dei thread durante l'enumerazione, è possibile bloccare la <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNodeCollection> durante l'intera enumerazione oppure intercettare le eccezioni determinate dalle modifiche apportate da altri thread.
